fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to choose redirect all players who would visit a player of your choice to a single random non-Governor Loyalist.
- Use 2 bees to choose up to three non-Loyalist slots on the rolelist. You will learn the players that take up those slots, but not which is which.
- Use 3 bees to choose two players. You will deal a Basic attack to all non-Loyalists among them.
